MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Questionnaire for Impulsive-Compulsive Disorders in Parkinsons Disease?Rating Scale (QUIP-RS)

quip_gambling_01.Description: QUIP-RS: Q1 Gambling - How much do you think about the following behavior (such as having trouble keeping thoughts out of your mind or feeling guilty)

quip_sex_01.Description: QUIP-RS: Q1 Sex - How much do you think about the following behavior (such as having trouble keeping thoughts out of your mind or feeling guilty)

quip_buying_01.Description: QUIP-RS: Q1 Buying - How much do you think about the following behavior (such as having trouble keeping thoughts out of your mind or feeling guilty)

quip_eating_01.Description: QUIP-RS: Q1 Eating - How much do you think about the following behavior (such as having trouble keeping thoughts out of your mind or feeling guilty)

quip_task_01.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q1 Thinking about performing tasks or hobbies
quip_task_01.Description: QUIP-RS: Q1 Performing tasks or hobbies - How much do you think about the following behavior (such as having trouble keeping thoughts out of your mind or feeling guilty)

quip_repetative_01.Description: QUIP-RS: Q1 Repeating simple activities - How much do you think about the following behavior (such as having trouble keeping thoughts out of your mind or feeling guilty)

quip_med_01.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q1 Taking your PD medications
quip_med_01.Description: QUIP-RS: Q1 Taking your PD medications - How much do you think about the following behavior (such as having trouble keeping thoughts out of your mind or feeling guilty)

quip_gambling_02.Description: QUIP-RS: Q2 Gambling - Do you have urges or desires for the following behaviors that you feel are excessive or cause you distress (including becoming restless or irritable when unable to participate in them)?

quip_sex_02.Description: QUIP-RS: Q2 Sex - Do you have urges or desires for the following behaviors that you feel are excessive or cause you distress (including becoming restless or irritable when unable to participate in them)?

quip_buying_02.Description: QUIP-RS: Q2 Buying - Do you have urges or desires for the following behaviors that you feel are excessive or cause you distress (including becoming restless or irritable when unable to participate in them)?

quip_eating_02.Description: QUIP-RS: Q2 Eating - Do you have urges or desires for the following behaviors that you feel are excessive or cause you distress (including becoming restless or irritable when unable to participate in them)?

quip_task_02.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q2 Thinking about performing tasks or hobbies
quip_task_02.Description: QUIP-RS: Q2 Performing tasks or hobbies - Do you have urges or desires for the following behaviors that you feel are excessive or cause you distress (including becoming restless or irritable when unable to participate in them)?

quip_repetative_02.Description: QUIP-RS: Q2 Repeating simple activities - Do you have urges or desires for the following behaviors that you feel are excessive or cause you distress (including becoming restless or irritable when unable to participate in them)?

quip_med_02.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q2 Taking your PD medications
quip_med_02.Description: QUIP-RS: Q2 Taking your PD medications - Do you have urges or desires for the following behaviors that you feel are excessive or cause you distress (including becoming restless or irritable when unable to participate in them)?

quip_gambling_03.Description: QUIP-RS: Q3 Gambling - Do you have difficulty controlling the following behaviors down or stopping them)?

quip_sex_03.Description: QUIP-RS: Q3 Sex - Do you have difficulty controlling the following behaviors down or stopping them)?

quip_buying_03.Description: QUIP-RS: Q3 Buying - Do you have difficulty controlling the following behaviors down or stopping them)?

quip_eating_03.Description: QUIP-RS: Q3 Eating - Do you have difficulty controlling the following behaviors down or stopping them)?

quip_task_03.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q3 Thinking about performing tasks or hobbies
quip_task_03.Description: QUIP-RS: Q3 Performing tasks or hobbies - Do you have difficulty controlling the following behaviors down or stopping them)?

quip_repetative_03.Description: QUIP-RS: Q3 Repeating simple activities - Do you have difficulty controlling the following behaviors down or stopping them)?

quip_med_03.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q3 Taking your PD medications
quip_med_03.Description: QUIP-RS: Q3 Taking your PD medications - Do you have difficulty controlling the following behaviors down or stopping them)?

quip_gambling_04.Description: QUIP-RS: Q4 Gambling - Do you engage in activities specifically to continue the following behaviors (such as hiding what you are doing, lying, hoarding things, borrowing from others, accumulating debt, stealing, or being involved in illegal acts)?

quip_sex_04.Description: QUIP-RS: Q4 Sex - Do you engage in activities specifically to continue the following behaviors (such as hiding what you are doing, lying, hoarding things, borrowing from others, accumulating debt, stealing, or being involved in illegal acts)?

quip_buying_04.Description: QUIP-RS: Q4 Buying - Do you engage in activities specifically to continue the following behaviors (such as hiding what you are doing, lying, hoarding things, borrowing from others, accumulating debt, stealing, or being involved in illegal acts)?

quip_eating_04.Description: QUIP-RS: Q4 Eating - Do you engage in activities specifically to continue the following behaviors (such as hiding what you are doing, lying, hoarding things, borrowing from others, accumulating debt, stealing, or being involved in illegal acts)?

quip_task_04.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q4 Thinking about performing tasks or hobbies
quip_task_04.Description: QUIP-RS: Q4 Performing tasks or hobbies - Do you engage in activities specifically to continue the following behaviors (such as hiding what you are doing, lying, hoarding things, borrowing from others, accumulating debt, stealing, or being involved in illegal acts)?

quip_repetative_04.Description: QUIP-RS: Q4 Repeating simple activities - Do you engage in activities specifically to continue the following behaviors (such as hiding what you are doing, lying, hoarding things, borrowing from others, accumulating debt, stealing, or being involved in illegal acts)?

quip_med_04.LongName: QUIP-RS: Q4 Taking your PD medications
quip_med_04.Description: QUIP-RS: Q4 Taking your PD medications - Do you engage in activities specifically to continue the following behaviors (such as hiding what you are doing, lying, hoarding things, borrowing from others, accumulating debt, stealing, or being involved in illegal acts)?

quip_gambling_total.Description: QUIP-RS A. Gambling Total (0-16): quip_gambling_01 + quip_gambling_02 +  quip_gambling_03 + quip_gambling_04

quip_sex_total.Description: QUIP-RS B. Sex Total (0-16): quip_sex_01 + quip_sex_02 +  quip_sex_03 + quip_sex_04

quip_buying_total.Description: QUIP-RS C. Buying Total (0-16): quip_buying_01 + quip_buying_02 +  quip_buying_03 + quip_buying_04

quip_eating_total.Description: QUIP-RS D. Eating Total (0-16): quip_eating_01 + quip_eating_02 +  quip_eating_03 + quip_eating_04

quip_punding_total.Description: QUIP-RS . Hobbyism-Punding Total (0-32): quip_task_01 + quip_task_02 +  quip_task_03 + quip_task_04 + quip_repetative_01 + quip_repetative_02 +  quip_repetative_03 + quip_repetative_04

quip_med_total.Description: QUIP-RS F. PD Medication Use Total (0-16): quip_med_01 + quip_med_02 +  quip_med_03 + quip_med_04

quip_icd_total.Description: QUIP-RS Impulse Control Disorder Total (0-64): quip_gambling_total + quip_sex_total + quip_buying_total + quip_eating_total

quip_rs_total.Description: QUIP-RS Total (0-112): quip_gambling_total + quip_sex_total + quip_buying_total + quip_eating_total + quip_punding_total + quip_md_total
